chunkSaveDelay.desc:: Delay before a chunk is saved to disk, default: 300 seconds. If you enable the noSaveAll config, it is suggest to set this to 180.

noSaveAll.desc:: Disables saving all chunks at once every 5 minutes(also does prevent the saveall command from saving chunks). By default this does disable the save all chunks at once every 5 minutes because those are now saved smoothly distributed over time instead. default: true

debugLogging.desc:: Enables debug logging of how many chunks got saved in a tick. default: false
